name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Marvin MILES, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Marvin MILES, Appellant.
attorneys: John W. Packel, Chief/Appeals Div., Asst. Public Defender, Peter Rosalsky, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Eric B. Henson, Deputy Dist. Atty., Ann C. Lebowitz, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
500 A.2d 426
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Marvin MILES, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 25, 1985.
Decided Nov. 21, 1985.
John W. Packel, Chief/Appeals Div., Asst. Public Defender, Peter Rosalsky, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Eric B. Henson, Deputy Dist. Atty., Ann C. Lebowitz, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
